What we love

If you have got an e-bike, scooter, or something along those lines, it can be easy to overlook filling the tires when the process of airing them up feels like an inconvenient  and time consuming ordeal. This palm-sized pump is battery-powered and aims to make it about as easy as possible to dial in your desired PSI and then let it do all of the heavy lifting.

items.title: Space DOTS raises $1.5M seed round to provide insights on orbital threats
items.summary: Cefalo is the founder of Space DOTs, which launched in 2022 to detect space threats. She and her team have created a software platform for space tech manufacturers and operators to help them capture various data points, like radiation interference, as well as track any in-orbit anomalies, to help make space travel safer.

By way of its official Amazon storefront, Govee is offering up to 29% off its three sizes of Neon Rope Lights 2 with Matter, with its 9.8-foot model starting at $49.99 shipped. This is the smallest of the three options (next to the 16.4 and 32.8-foot models) that usually fetches $70 at full price, where it’s spent most of 2025 for non-Prime members, while regularly offering Prime-exclusive discounts to this rate, and occasional falls lower to $47. While we have seen it go as low as $42 in the past, today’s deal comes in as the second-best price of the year, saving you $20 off the going rate. You’ll find the 16.4-foot model down at $89.99 shipped right now, while the 32.8-foot model has fallen to $129.99 shipped.
